author: Justine Coleman
title: Trump administration ignored pandemic warning from White House economists: report
description: The Trump administration ignored a pandemic warning from White House economists who published a study estimating possible effects of a pandemic last September, according to a New York Times...
content:
The Trump administration ignored a pandemic warning from White House economists who published a study estimating possible effects of a pandemic last September, according to a New York Times report. 
The White House study reportedly cautioned that a pandemic,… [+2144 chars]
